content:
version 1.42 of the otp_server.exe binary, which sorted inherited fields
based on the order of the classes within the DC file, rather than based
on the order in which the references are made within the class. dc-virtual-inheritance bool 1 Set this true to support proper virtual inheritance in the dc file,
so that diamond-of-death type constructs can be used. This also enables
shadowing (overloading) of inherited method names from a base
class. debug-portal-cull bool 0 Set this true to enable debug visualization during portal
clipping.(You first need to enable portal culling, using the
allow-portal-cullvariable.) decompressor-step-time double 0.005 Specifies the maximum amount of time that should be consumed by a
single call to Decompressor::run(). default-antialias-enable bool 0 Set this true to enable the M_auto antialiasing mode for all nodes
